items.sentence: Tom and Mary never do anything together anymore.
Tom and Mary pitched their tent near the stream.
I\'m pretty sure Tom won\'t want to go with you.
I\'m pretty sure that Tom doesn\'t speak French.
I\'m pretty sure that Tom hasn\'t seen this yet.
Tom just had to accept things the way they were.
Tom just kept reading his book and ignored Mary.
Tom knew that Mary kept a key under the doormat.
Tom likes oranges and eats three or four a week.
Tom lives about thirty minutes from the airport.
